mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_Reservations_History (reservationNo, reservationStatus, reservationEventTimestamp) VALUES (#{reservationNo}, #{reservationStatus}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO TB_Payments_History (paymentNo, paymentStatus, paymentEventTimestamp, refundAmount) VALUES (#{paymentNo}, #{paymentStatus}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{refundAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(ex.exhibitionNo) AS exhibitionNo, MAX(ex.title) AS title, MAX(ex.cntcInsttNm) AS cntcInsttNm, MAX(ex.issuedDate) AS issuedDate, MAX(ex.description) AS description, MAX(ex.imageUrl) AS imageUrl, MAX(ex.viewCount) AS viewCount, MAX(ex.eventSite) AS eventSite, MAX(ex.contactPoint) AS contactPoint, MAX(ex.startPeriod) AS startPeriod, MAX(ex.endPeriod) AS endPeriod, rm.reservationNo, rm.userNo, rm.exhibitionNo, rm.reservationPrice, rm.reservationQuantity, rm.reservationStatus, pm.paymentNo, pm.paymentUid, pm.paymentMethod, pm.paymentStatus, pm.paymentPrice, pm.paymentDate, MAX(ph.refundAmount) AS refundAmount, MAX(ph.paymentEventTimestamp) AS paymentEventTimestamp FROM tb_exhibitions_master ex JOIN tb_reservations_master rm ON ex.exhibitionNo = rm.exhibitionNo JOIN tb_payments_master pm ON rm.reservationNo = pm.reservationNo JOIN tb_payments_history ph ON pm.paymentNo = ph.paymentNo JOIN tb_users_master um ON um.userNo = rm.userNo WHERE rm.userNo = 6 AND pm.paymentStatus = '환불' AND rm.reservationStatus = '취소' GROUP BY rm.reservationNo, rm.userNo, rm.exhibitionNo, rm.reservationPrice, rm.reservationQuantity, rm.reservationStatus, pm.paymentNo, pm.paymentUid, pm.paymentMethod, pm.paymentStatus, pm.paymentPrice, pm.paymentDate ORDER BY rm.reservationNo DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size};

SELECT em.title, em.cntcInsttNm, em.imageUrl, em.eventSite, em.startPeriod, em.endPeriod, em.adultPrice, em.infantPrice, em.seniorPrice, rm.reservationNo, pm.paymentNo, pm.paymentPrice, pm.paymentMethod, ph.paymentHistoryNo, ph.paymentEventTimestamp, ph.refundAmount, ph.paymentStatus FROM tb_exhibitions_master em INNER JOIN tb_reservations_master rm ON em.exhibitionNo = rm.exhibitionNo INNER JOIN tb_payments_master pm ON rm.reservationNo = pm.reservationNo INNER JOIN tb_payments_history ph ON pm.paymentNo = ph.paymentNo WHERE pm.paymentNo = #{paymentNo} AND ph.paymentStatus = '환불' ORDER BY ph.paymentEventTimestamp DESC LIMIT 1;
